description:
Special shinobi. Currently, he is still the active commander of the torture and interrogation unit of Konoha Anbu.
In the issue of the forty-fourth group, I dared to disband the forty-fourth group in order to prevent the runaway of the cats, who could not control the beast. He was also in charge of interrogating Katajsuke after the Momoshiki attack and Shojoji after the Tento kidnapping.
name: Morino Ibiki
